element.name: TMufasaBitmap
element.short: Bitmap class for the Mufasa library

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.OnDestroy
element.short: Called when destroying the TMufasaBitmap

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.Name
element.short: Name of the bitmap. Mainly for debugging purposes.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.SetSize
element.short: Set the bitmap to the given size.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.ValidatePoint
element.short: Returns true if the point is within the bitmap size.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.Posterize
element.short: Posterizes the target bitmap

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.Invert
element.short: Invert the colours on the bitmap.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.Contrast
element.short: Change contrast.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.Brightness
element.short: Change brightness

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.GreyScale
element.short: Greyscales the bitmap

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.Desaturate
element.short: Desaturates the bitmap.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.RotateBitmap
element.short: Rotate the bitmap.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.CopyClientToBitmap
element.short: Copy (a part of) the Window to the bitmap.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.FastReplaceColor
element.short: Replace OldColor with NewColor.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.FastDrawClear
element.short: Fill the bitmap with a specific colour.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.GetAreaColors
element.short: Return the bitmap data in a two dimensional array.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.FastGetPixels
element.short: Return the corresponding colour of each point.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.FastGetPixel
element.short: Returns the colour at the corresponding point.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.DrawToCanvas
element.short: Draw the bitmap on a canvas.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.DrawTPA
element.short: Draw the points in the tpointarray on the bitmap with the given colour.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.LoadFromRawImage
element.short: Loads a bitmap from a RawImage type.
element.descr: This can be virtually any type. As long as the RawImage is specified correctly, this function will load it and transform it into a TMufasaBitmap. It will do all the necessary shifts and swizzles to get the image in the TMufasaBitmap format.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.LoadFromTBitmap
element.short: Load the data of a TBitmap into the TMufasaBitmap

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.ToString
element.short: Turn the bitmap data into a string, base64 encoded.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.ToTBitmap
element.short: Creates a TBitmap from a TMufasaBitmap.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.Copy
element.short: Create a (partial) copy of the TMufasaBitmap.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.LoadFromFile
element.short: Load a TMufasaBitmap from file. All bitmap types supported by TLazIntFImage are supported.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.LoadFromFile.FileName
element.short: Path to the file that is to be loaded.

element.name: TMufasaBitmap.SaveToFile
element.short: Save the TMufasaBitmap to a file.

element.name: ArrDataToRawImage
element.short: Create a TRawImage from passed pixel data.
